name: Mopaiv Dark Mode
description: Dark mode for Mopaiv.com (fan-made), made by Index.
additional_info:
This is still in development, there may be a few bugs. They should be fixed soon.

Friday June 25th
- Modals now display correctly. (Thanks, Ezekia for reminding me!)
- Text on API based pages such as usercount now are visible and don't blend in with the background anymore.

Monday June 21st
- Small fixes

Sunday June 20th
- Release
